arts.ttl: Eddie Howe reveals reaction from Newcastle stars to Nick Woltemade's winner in victory over Wolves - and tells the star where he needs to improve after impressive debut
arts.sum: CRAIG HOPE AT ST JAMES' PARK: The Newcastle and Germany striker headed the game's only goal in the 30th minute and left to a standing ovation after the hour mark.

arts.ttl: Steve Bull claims Newcastle United will drop off this season as he predicts Wolves clash
arts.sum: Wolves are underdogs going into this one, but Steve Bull sees weaknesses in this Newcastle side that can be exploited by Vitor Pereira . Wolves legend Steve Bull never shied away from a battle with Newcastle during his career, scoring six in seven appearances.

arts.ttl: Vitor Pereira drops Wolves team news hint on Tolu Arokodare ahead of Newcastle United
arts.sum: Jorgen Strand Larsen’s absence for Wolves’ trip to Newcastle leaves Vitor Pereira with a decision to make at striker. On the other hand, Hwang has started already this season, scoring against Everton and leading the line in Wolves’ only win of the season against West Ham.

arts.ttl: Nick Woltemade makes instant impact on Newcastle debut to see off Wolves
arts.athr: Louise Taylor at St James' Park
arts.sum: Anonymity and Nick Woltemade were already well on the way to becoming strangers but, after this, there seems zero chance of the Germany striker ever being able to blend seamlessly into the background on Tyneside. Given that Woltemade’s awkwardly angular 6ft 6in frame is topped by a curly mop of bright blond hair and a distinctive moustache screams 1970s rock star, he was already hard to miss. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Woltemade’s debut header clinches Newcastle win over Wolves
arts.sum: Woltemade nodded in Murphy’s cross to seal his first Magpies goal. Pope’s early saves kept Wolves at bay, while Tonali hit the post in a lively, tense Tyneside affair.
